definitions.definition: To restrain within boundaries ; to limit; to confine
examples: After suffering diahrroea, the patient was restricted to a diet of rice, cold meat, and yoghurt.

definitions.definition: To consider (a function ) as defined on a subset of its original domain .
examples: If we restrict sine to [ − π 2 , π 2 ] {\displaystyle \left[-{\frac {\pi }{2}},{\frac {\pi }{2}}\right]} , we can define its inverse.

main_definition: To restrain within boundaries ; to limit; to confine
secondary_definitions: ( specifically , mathematics ) To consider (a function ) as defined on a subset of its original domain .
